title: Real Cheat Online - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Sci-fi   Shounen
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Brother Complex   Dense Protagonist   Dungeons   Firearms   Handsome Male Lead   Loli   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   MMORPG   Overpowered Protagonist   Sister Complex   Virtual Reality   Younger Sisters
author: Stef   すてふ
description:
Pursing reality, the VRMMO world directly reflects one’s own ability. In this place where level nor status exists, have no choice but to use magic or learn pseudo-skills of masters with Combat Assistance System 《Arts》 to combat against the siege of monsters. 

Because of the gifted education Souichiro received from his father, a member of the special forces, he grow up with the best of human weapons. He who yearned to play and live life like a normal, average high school student dived into a virtual world together with his friend. Instead, what awaited him was not glory but oddballs which surpasses everything he expected.

Can the boy with nicknames such as “The Hidden Boss”, “Hidden Character of Management Side”, or “Maybe He Stopped Being a Human” continue to play normally and safely?>
